title: Will I be keeping these rewards?
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/b8a3b17c6b32f532c078a9ba57f8741e.png

I got some skins I really liked and I'm a bit sad they went away. 2 of my favorite skins were in there, Arcade Sona and SG Lux.

After this bug gets fixed will some of these rewards come back or will they be new skins?


Edit: I just saw a post from a Rioter saying to make a ticket because they will give it to you so I did that!

replies.body:
No worries! As I'm sure you saw my reply earlier, we can still see what skins you were offered first. We can still give you those offers as long as you write in soon ^_^! 

PS: Holy heck those are some nice skins in your shop!
Yep I'm having some great luck this week
